argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | cnsubglem.1 | |- ( x e. A -> x e. CC ) |
| 2 |  | cnsubglem.2 | |- ( ( x e. A /\ y e. A ) -> ( x + y ) e. A ) |
| 3 |  | cnsubmlem.3 | |- 0 e. A |
| 4 | 1 | #P_ssriv | |- A C_ CC |
| 5 | 2 | #P_rgen2a | |- A. x e. A A. y e. A ( x + y ) e. A |
| 6 |  | #P_cnring | |- CCfld e. Ring |
| 7 |  | #P_ringmnd | |- ( CCfld e. Ring -> CCfld e. Mnd ) |
| 8 |  | #P_cnfldbas | |- CC = ( Base ` CCfld ) |
| 9 |  | #P_cnfld0 | |- 0 = ( 0g ` CCfld ) |
| 10 |  | #P_cnfldadd | |- + = ( +g ` CCfld ) |
| 11 | 8, 9, 10 | #P_issubm | |- ( CCfld e. Mnd -> ( A e. ( SubMnd ` CCfld ) <-> ( A C_ CC /\ 0 e. A /\ A. x e. A A. y e. A ( x + y ) e. A ) ) ) |
| 12 | 6, 7, 11 | #P_mp2b | |- ( A e. ( SubMnd ` CCfld ) <-> ( A C_ CC /\ 0 e. A /\ A. x e. A A. y e. A ( x + y ) e. A ) ) |
| 13 | 4, 3, 5, 12 | #P_mpbir3an | |- A e. ( SubMnd ` CCfld ) |
